conversations.conversation:
Be Truthful ;
;
;1)Who are you?
;2)Are we friends?
;3)When and how did we meet?
;4)Do you have a crush on me?
;5)Would you kiss me?
;6)Give me a nickname and explain why?
;7)Describe me in 3 words?
;8)What was ur first impression of me?
;9)Do u still think the same?
;10)What reminds you of me?
;11)If u cld give me anythin wot wud it be?
;12)How well do u know me?
;13)What do you like best about me?
;14)Ever wanted to tell something u cudnt?
;15)Are you going to put this on your blog and see what i say bout u?
